1. City Council

City Council
============

![Flower pots on brick road](https://www.cityofmabanktx.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=151)

* 1st Tuesday of each month (unless a City observed Holiday)
* Council Chamber Room (inside City Hall)
  129 E Market Street
  Mabank, TX 75147

If a meeting date falls on a City observed holiday, the meeting will be scheduled for another day during the month. The rescheduled meeting date as well as any other special sessions will be posted on the city's web site on this page and the events page and as soon as it is determined.

As required by state law, an agenda for each meeting is conveniently posted for the public to view at least seventy-two (72) hours prior to the meeting. The city's official posting site for the city council agendas is on the front glass City hall located at 129 E Market Street. Current agendas and past agendas can be obtained from the City Secretary at the City hall.

### Derek Harrill, Council



![Joey Rich](https://www.cityofmabanktx.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=355)

### Joey Rich, Council

For those citizens that have special needs to attend the meeting please call the city secretary in advance at 903-887-3241. We will try to accommodate your needs. Persons who would like to speak to the Council will need to complete a form located at the City Hall one week prior to the set meeting date.
